> OOC - Please ignore my use of John Woo Wuxia for this.  Heh.

OOC: Ignore? Nahhhh!!! :)

> <OOC>
>
> As BLACKARACHNIA fought over against her adversary, her normal ability to
> use her hyperagility to defeat bulkier adversaries was fairly useless
> against an opponent who was equally skilled as she was!
>
> As KILLER PUNCH went ou twtih blows towards her, BLACKARACHNIA went to
> leap up in the air..  Intent on literally landing ON his shield, balanced on the
> edge of it with her hyper-agility to then try and blast his upper torso over
> with her energon draining webbing!

"Blasted bug!" KILLER PUNCH said as he saw BLACKARACHNIA's leap onto
his shield, a move which caught him almost completely by surprise!
With a quick shake of his shield he attempted to dislodge her, a look
of revultion moving across his faceplate as he did so.

He tried to spin as he saw her firing her webbing. However the very
armor that protected him from blows also made it difficult to move as
fast as he needed to and a few pieces of her webbing caught hold of
him for a moment and stuck!

With a quick move he cut it away, but some damage had already been
done as some of his energies had been drained away!

KILLER PUNCH looked over at BLACKARACHNIA, "Is that all you have?" He
said, his chuckle sounded a bit tired as he spoke. "Come on, I can do
this all day!"

With a clumsy swing KILLER PUNCH slashed out at BLACKARACHNIA with his weapon!

Could KILLER PUNCH really be as tired as he looked, especially with
BLACKARACHNIA having scored on him with her energy draining webbing
for a moment, or was this a feint to cause her to lower her guard?

KILLER PUNCH was well known to be trickey.

(TAG)

- Preston
